event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: None. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: TTY buffer for a domain overflowed, resulting in lost domain console data.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
TTY buffer for a domain overflowed, resulting in lost domain console data.

Domain console data is lost.

No action is taken as a result of this fault and no service action is required.

This could be the result of problems with a telnet client.


   If the problem persists, proceed with the steps outlined below.


       LEGEND

      RED        = SUNW-MSG-ID
      BLUE     = EVENT_ID
      GREEN  = FRU


Step 1. Collect the fault message (use one of the following methods):


   Single-line fault message displayed on the XSCF console:

   Mar 20 21:41:49 san-ff2-21-0 fmd: SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12, CSN: 7860000772  
   EVENT-ID: 2d8c40d6-4810-4e9c-99c9-1a7eadbc54ee
   Refer to %FMAURL%/SCF-8005-T5 for detailed information.


   Complete fault message using 'fmdump -m' on the XSCF console:

   MSG-ID: SCF-8005-T5, TYPE: Upset, VER: 1, SEVERITY: Minor
   EVENT-TIME: Tue Mar 20 21:41:49 UTC 2007
   PLATFORM: SPARC-Enterprise, CSN: 7860000772, HOSTNAME: san-ff2-21-0
   SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12
   EVENT-ID: 2d8c40d6-4810-4e9c-99c9-1a7eadbc54ee
   DESC: TTY buffer for a domain overflowed, resulting in lost domain console data.
   Refer to %FMAURL%/SCF-8005-T5 for more information.
   AUTO-RESPONSE: No action is taken as a result of this fault.
   IMPACT: Domain console data is lost.
   REC-ACTION: None. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.


Step 2. Collect the output from the 'fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID' command

   
   SPARC Enterprise platform example:
 
   xscf> fmdump -v -u 2d8c40d6-4810-4e9c-99c9-1a7eadbc54ee

         TIME                 UUID                                 MSG-ID
         Mar 20 21:41:49.1759 2d8c40d6-4810-4e9c-99c9-1a7eadbc54ee SCF-8005-T5
           100%  upset.chassis.domain.tty-overflow

                 Problem in: hc:///chassis=0/domain=0
                    Affects: -
                        FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC-Enterprise:chassis-id=7860000772:
                             server-id=san-ff2-21-0/component=CHASSIS


Step 3. Contact your Authorized Service Provider.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
response
event_registry_properties.item: No action is taken as a result of this fault.
event_registry_properties.name: title
event_registry_properties.item: TTY buffer for a domain overflowed.
